name: react-placeloader
description: Hold things in place, while loading.

scripts.docs: build-storybook -c .storybook -o docs && perl -pi -e 's/React Storybook/PlaceLoader/g' docs/index.html && cp .storybook/favicon.ico docs
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && babel src -d dist && node-sass main.scss --output-style compressed -o dist
scripts.deploy: npm run docs && surge -p docs -d placeloader.surge.sh && surge -p vanilla -d placeloader-vanilla.surge.sh

author: Balthazar Gronon <bgronon@gmail.com>
